summary: The incident involves unusual alerts possibly related to VPN activity and user reports of popups, indicating a potential account compromise.

immediate: Investigate unusual alerts and user reports
long_term: Conduct user awareness training regarding popups
notes: Low similarity with retrieved incidents, but may involve themes from INC-006 regarding account compromise.

similar_incidents.title: Unauthorized admin access attempt
similar_incidents.snippet: Several failed admin logins followed by a successful login from an unusual geo. No change tickets exist. Potential account compromise.

similar_incidents.title: Suspicious outbound DNS to rare domains
similar_incidents.snippet: DNS logs show hosts querying rare domains with randomized subdomains. Could indicate DNS tunneling or C2 over DNS.

assumptions: The user reports of popups are valid and related to the incident.
The alerts are not false positives and require investigation.
open_questions: What specific alerts are being triggered?
What type of popups is the user experiencing?
Is there any unusual VPN activity recorded?
